EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.XLE.All.N.G.N.13061.FN POL (NEW).Email 6 - consideration
EmailTemplate.subject: Smart building connectivity that makes properties cheaper to develop and maintain
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Switch to Passive Optical LAN to cut costs and boost performance A new local area network solution is bringing significant increases in performance – and significant cost savings – to smart buildings, campuses and resorts around the world. Discover why Environment Canterbury of New Zealand decided to bring their office building up to light speed by switching to Nokia Passive Optical LAN. U.S. and Canada:+1 866-231-0264 (M-F 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. EST)
Europe & Asia Pacific: + 44 203 582 5650 (M-F 8:00a.m.- 4:00p.m. GMT)
Or use the How to Buy form <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]>
Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
